name: Menu Button Blues Gdevelop tutorial source code
name_original: Menu Button Blues Gdevelop tutorial source code
description:
In Gdevelop...

Sometimes we change between scenes and due to button placement, we go right back to the scene we were changing from so fast, that we don't think we changed scenes at all...or the scene we were on resets. This tutorial covers how to fix that...one method anyway. And I threw in the mobile version for an extra kick (tested and is working).
